channel.title: Making client run on diffrent cache
channel.description: how do i make a 317 client run on a 508+ cache? preferably 602 if it will work.

item.title: Making client run on diffrent cache
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

so should i clear out the cache and put all of the information form the other cache into the 317’s cache?

Read full topic
item.source: Making client run on diffrent cache

item.title: Making client run on diffrent cache
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This is something that, only 2 people I know of, have accomplished. The problem with doing it is, you must update ALL loading methods to work with the new headers, and all of the index’s. Alot more has to be done, but that is the major peice.

It is easier, to just pack all of the data into the 317 cache. Sure, it does ruin some of it, and not all of it will be 100%, but it saves time so you can work on doing that in another client.

Read full topic
item.source: Making client run on diffrent cache
